snippet.title: LinkedIn Speaks YUI
snippet.description:
* Steve Ganz
LinkedIn Speaks YUI Steve Ganz June 5, 2008
YUI stands for Yahoo! User Interface Library which is a set of utilities and controls, written in JavaScript, for building rich interactive web applications. The web developers of the User Experience team here at LinkedIn make extensive use of YUI and recently sat down to talk about it with Nate Koechley, Senior Frontend Engineer on the YUI Team at Yahoo! Thanks to Nate and everyone else on the YUI team for giving us the tools that help us spend more time focusing on developing the…
* Topics: * Engineering
